item.description: NAS Update Containers Script docker/ ├─ update.sh ├─ project1/ │ ├─ docker-compose.yml ├─ project2/ │ ├─ docker-compose.yml │ ├─ .DISABLED #!/bin/bash root_path="/volume1/docker" ########################################### # UPDATE ALL PROJECTS ########################################### # Use a for loop to iterate through folders in the directory for folder in $root_path/*; do cd $root_path # Check if the item is a directory if [ -d "$folder" ]; then if [ -e "$folder/docker-compose.yml" ]; then echo "Docker project found in $folder" if [ -e "$folder/.
